10662526601 = 2201³ is the only known pa: 10662526601 = 2201³ ndio mchemraba pekee unaojulikana wa palindromic ambao mzizi wake wa mchemraba si palindromic (palindrome ni nambari inayosomeka kwa kurudi nyuma na mbele).
Take the number 1030301. It is a palindr: Chukua nambari 1030301. Ni palindrome. Mzizi wake wa mchemraba ni 101, ambayo pia ni palindrome. Je, unaweza kupata mifano mingine ambayo ni palindromes zote mbili? (Kumbuka kwamba nambari zote za tarakimu moja ni palindromes!)
According to the On-line Encyclopedia of: Kulingana na Encyclopedia On-line of Integer Sequences, Mlolongo wa nambari kamili ambazo mchemraba wake ni palindromic huanza:
The corresponding sequence of palindromi: Mlolongo sambamba wa cubes palindromic huanza:
2201 is the smallest (and only one known: 2201 ndio ndogo zaidi (na moja tu inayojulikana hadi sasa) ambayo yenyewe sio ya ugonjwa wa ugonjwa.
There are 5 palindromic square numbers b: Kuna nambari 5 za mraba za palindromic kati ya 1 na 100 (pamoja) ambazo mizizi yake ya mraba pia ni palindrome. Je, unaweza kuwapata wote?
Remember all one digit numbers are palin: Kumbuka nambari zote za tarakimu moja ni palindromes.
People have used computers to try and fi: Watu wametumia kompyuta kujaribu kupata nambari nyingine ya palindromic ambayo mchemraba wake sio palindromic lakini hakuna mtu aliyeipata. Hii inaweza kuwa kwa sababu kuna moja ambayo ni kubwa kuliko nambari ambazo zimejaribiwa hadi sasa, au inaweza kuwa kwamba hazipo tena.
